short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wysiwyg and Visual Math, LaTeX or TeX, AsciiMath, MathML and HTML Editor developed in HTML5

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Release 2.2.6 - Removed some permissions not required from file manifest of extension
==============
MathTeX is LaTeX, Ascii Mathematical, HTML and MathML editor and offers many tex or LaTeX and also AsciiMath symbols ready to use. 

- Is internationalized and support language: Français, Tiếng Việt, Deutsch, Español, русский and العربية.
- Is customizable with 5 elegants themes
- Equation Editor Samples: Science equation models, Chemical formula samples, Commutative diagram samples
- Export whole project to zip archive
- Save in single file equations (txt and pdf format) and render result as html format
- Cloud Print input and render result and also you can to save in Google Drive
- Keyboard shortcuts advanced to search and replace string in code textarea
- Import html element of web page in code Text-area of MathTeX using context menu
- Edit advanced options for editor and save settings in local disk
